message:
Help needed! 

On iOS or Android is there a way to create push notifications that have a custom view (i.e. custom actions like Download Update, Confirm...etc.) And i need to push these notification to users on certain times they can be local notifications or pushed from internet the important thing is that i can get the custom view even if the app is closed.

Any idea how?

data.message:
I need to show a notification to the user but not the standard push notification you get, i need to provide couple of actions on the notification view itself. let's say a download button and cancel button. 

I can do this with in-app notifications but that require the app to be working on the background. I need to be able to show these custom views notifications while the app is closed if that possible.

I am not sure if its possible yet, but i've seen Facebook notifications with LIKE button.
R u developing native apps or cross platform?
Doesn't matter still researching can choose the platform if the feature is available.

As far as I know custome actions in the notification can be done in android v4.1 and higher.. native development required 
http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/notifiers/notifications.html
But let me check if this can be done using a cross platform framework
again nothing about closed or active apps, very confusing.
This can be done using a BroadcastReceiver even if the app is closed NOT killed from app manager

This can be done in Apache Cordova, check the below
http://devgirl.org/2013/07/17/tutorial-implement-push-notifications-in-your-phonegap-application/

If you get the notification while your app is closed, tapping the notification will open your app and show whatever custom view you implemented.

Action based push notifications are now available on iOS 8 and I think Android 4+. In this kind of notifications, you can send a direct action to the user like a subscribe button to newsletters or a question with simple answers like yes and no
This can be done using third party providers like Urban Airship or Netmera
and this kind of notifications do not require the app to be running in the background
